Perplex: Hey, put that thing away, we shouldn't draw any weapons inside of =
the base.

Sarge: Don't you see? The weapon is here because I think you mig=
ht be trying to trick me. Maybe you're really with Deemos, and want to trap=
 me here and kill me. Sorry about that, I don't really believe that, I just=
 don't know what else to say.

Perplex: Maybe we should just offer to help =
the Chosen Mafia out in exchange for them not trying to hurt us.

Sarge: Ar=
e you out of your mind, boy? As soon as we have our backs turned Deemos wil=
l rip our sparks out through our eyes!

Arrow: I have to agree on this one.=
 That's the stupidest idea I've ever heard. If we try to side with them, th=
ey'll just wait for the opportunity to kill us all. If that happens, I won'=
t be here, because I will have already left. I don't want to die until I'm =
sure I've done everything I can to insure your safety, but if you want to c=
ondemn yourself, Perplex, how about YOU be the one who ask them? "Hi, Chose=
n Mafia, I'm Perplex, and I was wondering--" BANG! I'm sure we can get alon=
g without you Perplex, so go on. If that's what you want to do, ask them fo=
r an alliance.

Sarge: Well said, soldier.

Perplex: You're wrong, Arrow. I=
 think that we can really side with their team the Alliance. It would mean =
joining the evil side, but we can be rid of their attacks forever.

Sarge: =
Boy, Deemos doesn't stop till he gets what he wants. If we side with the Al=
liance, then they'll kill us and walk off.

Perplex: What's wrong with you =
anyway?

Sarge: You don't know how tough my life's been, boy. You have no i=
dea...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 9:23 PM
  Subject: Re: =
Chivtron Decisions


  Sarge drew his rifle.

  Sarge: Deemos is mine. I'm =
in charge here...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: gunthers8@ne=
tscape.net 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, June 30, 20=
01 6:58 PM
    Subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions




    Grounded thought har=
d for a bit. "All right, I announce now the death 
    sentence on Deemos f=
or crimes first and second degree murder.  It is 
    now, your duty to kil=
l him, Aerotaur.  Not a savage grudge, but a law 
    announced. We will no=
t kill like ancient transformeres.  His so 
    called, lackeys, also have =
a death sentence for protecting aiding a 
    fellons escape.  Does this su=
it you both."
    --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
    > Trinity::=

    > 
    > "When wiull we started to train Uncle Aerotaur?????" said Tri=
nity
    > 
    > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
    > > ::Aerota=
ur::
    > >     "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too many times =
for 
    > me to let 
    > > him live.  This is all because I let him go t=
he first time he 
    > attacked.  As 
    > > for you Sarge, I have just a=
s much reason to kill him.  In our 
    last 
    > fight I 
    > > lost a=
n arm and a leg defending others.  I nearly died because 
    > there were =

    > > bots in the battle that shouldn't have been there.  I couldn't 
  =
  care 
    > less 
    > > about his lackeys.  Now then, let's get to the =
meeting so we can 
    > finish it 
    > > and start planning our attack."=
  He stands tall glaring at Sarge.
